rows.label: tlk41700172_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I think the world would be better
off without Blades.

rows.label: tlk41700172_01_msg0002
rows.name:
What's this? You have a Blade
with you...!

rows.label: tlk41700172_01_msg0003
rows.name:
A Superbian Blade killed
my family!

rows.label: tlk41700172_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Acedia manages all the Blades in Alst.
That's as good as this country killing my family!

rows.label: tlk41700172_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Taking in refugees is probably your way
of atoning... but I'll suck you dry
to the bone!
